name: Inside Theseus' Nightmare
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

In this puzzle-stealth game, you play as the ancient Greek hero Theseus, and delve further and further into the labyrinth. As you collect keys and unlock doors, you must hide both yourself and the thread that binds you to the entrance from the many minotaur within.
